cleaned_text: Acupuncture and TCM Before Covid Vaccine In my previous blog post, I talked about if [Acupuncture and Traditional Chinese Medicine (TCM) can be done after Covid vaccination](https://drxiangjun.com/blog/acupuncture-after-covid-vaccine). In this post, I am going to talk about if Acupuncture and Traditional Chinese Medicine can be done BEFORE Covid vaccination. Acupuncture and TCM can 'cool' the body down For most of us who have been vaccinated, we already have the experience of the side effects after getting the injection. And as mentioned before, side effects of vaccination are 'heaty' in nature. In Acupuncture and TCM, done with the right techniques and skills of the doctor, the body can be cooled down to prepare for the next injection. This is the way fevers and inflammatory diseases are treated with Acupuncture and TCM 'cooling' techniques, just that we are using them now before the side effects of the jab come. Acupuncture and TCM strengthen the Heart and Nervous System Covid vaccine usually results in people getting all jittery and fired up in their nervous systems. Doing [Acupuncture and TCM before your next jab will strengthen the Heart and nerves](https://drxiangjun.com/tcmwellness/tcm-wellness-sleep-and-mental-health-management) to withstand the side effects of the vaccine that cause overstimulation to the body. So yes, you SHOULD do Acupuncture and TCM BEFORE the Covid vaccination.
